results.content:
Mr. Tamin is a pleasure to learn from. This course walks you through, step by step, the entire process to set-up a Facebook type website. It is easy to understand and to follow.

Highly recommended to anyone thinking of endeavoring down this path.
results.content_html:
Mr. Tamin is a pleasure to learn from. This course walks you through, step by step, the entire process to set-up a Facebook type website. It is easy to understand and to follow.

Highly recommended to anyone thinking of endeavoring down this path.

results.content:
This should have been called"Setting Up JomSocial." The information presented here is little more than you could figure out on your own simply by reading through the screens.

The version of JomSocial shown in the videos is not up to date, so you have to look around for the area the instructor is covering (things have moved  around in subsequent versions of JomSocal).
The final question of the final quiz has an error in the 'correct' response.
All of this aside, the class was reasonably priced and for a complete newbie, there are things to be picked up here.
